$220,000.00/yr - $280,000.00/yr
Are you ready to embark on an incredible journey that could transform the lives of job seekers around the world? We are on the lookout for an enthusiastic and experienced Head of Job Supply to join our dynamic team and make a significant impact in the job market.About UsAt our organization, we are passionate about empowering job seekers to find their dream jobs and achieve professional fulfillment. With a strong global presence and a track record of success spanning many years, we have helped millions of individuals in over 180 countries build stronger resumes, cover letters, and CVs, ultimately helping them interview confidently and secure the perfect job faster.What You'll DoIn this role, you will play a pivotal part in revolutionizing the job marketplace by curating high-quality opportunities that align with our users' aspirations. Your mission will be to drive growth by implementing innovative solutions, leveraging cutting-edge technology, and ensuring seamless job curation and selection processes.Develop an exciting product roadmap to automate and enhance high-quality job curation.Identify and explore potential growth opportunities in the job market with a focus on a positive ROI.Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to achieve financial goals and operational excellence.Lead and scale our Jobs Operations team to deliver an exceptional job search experience.What You'll BringWe're looking for a creative and results-driven professional who thrives in a fast-paced environment and is passionate about making a difference in people's lives. If you possess the following qualifications, we want to hear from you:10+ years of experience in product management, growth, or general management for consumer-facing internet products.Demonstrated ability to set and achieve team goals, along with excellent collaboration skills and emotional intelligence.A proven track record of taking ownership, strategic thinking, and delivering tangible results.Knowledgeable about market trends and tech advancements, with the ability to translate insights into actionable strategies.Experience in working with machine learning, automation, NLP, and collaborating with technology partners.Strong leadership skills, managing multiple projects with tight deadlines, and a data-driven mindset.Preferred, But Not EssentialWhile not required, the following attributes would be advantageous:Familiarity with job boards and Application Tracking Systems.Deep marketplace experience, especially within the jobs space.Tech and product experience with a structured, data-driven approach.Effective communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to engage and inspire.Why Join UsAt our organization, we value diversity and inclusion, and we celebrate the uniqueness of each team member. Our workplace is a vibrant and welcoming environment where your talents and contributions will be recognized and appreciated. You'll be working with a team of experts, learners, contributors, and creatives, all united by a common goal: to help job seekers find their perfect opportunities and thrive professionally.We offer a competitive salary based on your location, skills, experience, and other relevant factors. Additionally, you may be eligible for various benefits, including medical, dental, vision, life, short and long-term disability insurance, 401(k), paid time off, sick leave, and paid holidays, all subject to applicable plan terms.Employment Type: Full-TimeSalary: $ 220,000.00 280,000.00 Per Year
